translations: adv.严重地；严肃地；严峻地；沉重地

phrs.translation: 沉重地, 严重地, 严峻地, 重大地

sentences.sentence: "I think I've covered that business more than adequately," he said gravely.
sentences.translation: “我认为我已经把那件事搞得够详细的了，”他一脸严肃地说。

sentences.sentence: "Of course," the Dodo replied very gravely.
sentences.translation: “当然了。”渡渡鸟非常严肃地回答。
